conbody.p: You might need to override authentication when you want to integrate with using a TestOps private instance. To learn more about TestOps private instance offering and how to enable your private instance from , see: TestOps Private Instance integrationâ€‹.

li.p: From version 8.6.0 onwards, you can override authentication with in .

conbody.p: In Katalon Studio > Project > Settings > Katalon TestOps, there is an option to override authentication.
By default, the Override authentication option is disabled, which means the Server URL and user credentials to connect with are inherited from what has been filled in the Activation dialog.

With the Override authentication option enabled, you can input a different Server URL and user credentials. This information is saved in <project folder>/settings/internal/com.kms.katalon.integration.analytics.properties.

You might need to override authentication when you want to integrate with Katalon TestOps using a TestOps private instance. To learn more about TestOps private instance offering and how to enable your private instance from , see TestOps Private Instance integration.
